parameters.query:
UPDATE gk_conversations
SET status = 'expired'
WHERE status = 'active'
  AND last_message_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '4 hours'
RETURNING id, remote_jid, push_name, message_count, last_message_at;

-- Detecta conversas que ficaram sem resposta (stalled)
-- Atendente mandou msg, nós respondemos, mas atendente não respondeu em 2h
UPDATE gk_conversations
SET status = 'stalled'
WHERE status = 'active'
  AND last_message_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '2 hours'
  AND last_message_at IS NOT NULL
RETURNING id, remote_jid, push_name;
